title: irappadillai manidA
sahitya:
irappadillai manidA arindavar


anupallavi

  pirapp-ariyAdenrum irukkum shuddhAnmAvE
pirivaru nAnenat-terivurum yOgigaL


caraNam    paravaikkum muTTaikkum uravinaip-pOlE pArvaikkup-pOrvai ivvuDalE
karandu kAicci urak-kutti kaDaindeDutta kalapparu veNNaiyaip-pOlE
kaniyil vidiayinaip-pOlE kaLimbaru gaganattaip-pOlE karma bandhamaTra 
kAya dondamaTra nirmala shuddha sutantara siddhargaL
